original: Netti
analyzed: na itti

original: Paṭiniddesavāra
analyzed: paṭiniddesa vāra

original: Vibhaṅga 3
analyzed: vibhaṅga

original: Yuttihāravibhaṅga
analyzed: yutti hāra vibhaṅga

original: Tattha katamo yuttihāro?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ yutti hāro

original: “Sabbesaṁ hārānan”ti, ayaṁ yuttihāro.
analyzed: sabbesam ayam yutti hāro

original: Kiṁ yojayati?
analyzed: kim yojayati

original: Cattāro mahāpadesā buddhāpadeso saṅghāpadeso sambahulattherāpadeso ekattherāpadeso.
analyzed: cattāraḥ mahāpadesāḥ buddhāpadeso saṅghāpadeso sambahula therāpadeso eka ttherāpadeso

original: Ime cattāro mahāpadesā, tāni padabyañjanāni sutte otārayitabbāni, vinaye sandassayitabbāni, dhammatāyaṁ upanikkhipitabbāni.
analyzed: ime cattāraḥ mahā padesā tāni pada byañjanāni sutte otārayitabbāni vinaye sandassayitabbāni dhammatāyam upanikkhipitabbāni

original: Katamasmiṁ sutte otārayitabbāni?
analyzed: katamasmim sutte otārayitabbāni

original: Catūsu ariyasaccesu.
analyzed: catūsu ariya saccesu

original: Katamasmiṁ vinaye sandassayitabbāni?
analyzed: katamasmin vinaye sandassayitabbāni

original: Rāgavinaye dosavinaye mohavinaye.
analyzed: rāga vinaye dosa vinaye moha vinaye

original: Katamissaṁ dhammatāyaṁ upanikkhipitabbāni?
analyzed: katamissam dhamma tāyam upanikkhipitabbāni

original: Paṭiccasamuppāde.
analyzed: paṭiccasamuppāde

original: Yadi catūsu ariyasaccesu avatarati, kilesavinaye sandissati, dhammatañca na vilometi, evaṁ āsave na janeti.
analyzed: yadi catūsu ariya saccesu avatarati kilesa vinaye sandissati dhamma tat ca na evam āsave na janeti

original: Catūhi mahāpadesehi yaṁ yaṁ yujjati, yena yena yujjati, yathā yathā yujjati, taṁ taṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: catūhi mahāpadesehi yam yam yujjati yena yena yujjati yathā yathā yujjati tam tam

original: Pañhaṁ pucchitena kati padāni pañheti padaso pariyogāhitabbaṁ vicetabbaṁ?
analyzed: pañham pucchitena kati padāni pañhā iti

original: Yadi sabbāni padāni ekaṁ atthaṁ abhivadanti, eko pañho.
analyzed: yadi sabbāni padāni ekam attham abhivadanti ekaḥ pañhaḥ

original: Atha cattāri padāni ekaṁ atthaṁ abhivadanti, eko pañho.
analyzed: atha cattāri padāni ekam attham abhivadanti ekaḥ pañho

original: Atha tīṇi padāni ekaṁ atthaṁ abhivadanti, eko pañho.
analyzed: atha tīṇi padāni ekam attham abhivadanti ekaḥ pañho

original: Atha dve padāni ekaṁ atthaṁ abhivadanti, eko pañho.
analyzed: atha dve padāni ekam attham abhivadanti ekaḥ pañho

original: Atha ekaṁ padaṁ ekaṁ atthaṁ abhivadati, eko pañho.
analyzed: atha ekam padam ekam attham abhivadati ekaḥ pañho

original: Taṁ upaparikkhamānena aññātabbaṁ kiṁ ime dhammā nānatthā nānābyañjanā, udāhu imesaṁ dhammānaṁ eko attho byañjanameva nānanti.
analyzed: tam upaparikkhamānena aññātabbam kim ime dhammāḥ nānatthāḥ nānā byañjanāḥ udāhu imesam dhammānam ekaḥ atthaḥ byañjanam eva nānanti

original: Yathā kiṁ bhave?
analyzed: yathā kim bhave

original: Yathā sā devatā bhagavantaṁ pañhaṁ pucchati.
analyzed: yathā sā devatā bhagavantam pañham pucchati

original: “Kenassubbhāhato loko,
analyzed: lokaḥ

original: kenassu parivārito;
analyzed: kenassu parivāritaḥ

original: Kena sallena otiṇṇo,
analyzed: kena sallena otiṇṇaḥ

original: kissa dhūpāyito sadā”ti.
analyzed: kissa dhūpāyitaḥ sadāti

original: Imāni cattāri padāni pucchitāni.
analyzed: imāni cattāri padāni pucchitāni

original: Te tayo pañhā kathaṁ ñāyati?
analyzed: te tayo pañhā katham ñāyati

original: Bhagavā hi devatāya visajjeti.
analyzed: bhagavān hi devatāya visajja iti

original: “Maccunābbhāhato loko,
analyzed: lokaḥ

original: jarāya parivārito;
analyzed: jarāya parivāritaḥ

original: Taṇhāsallena otiṇṇo,
analyzed: taṇhā sallena otiṇṇaḥ

original: icchādhūpāyito sadā”ti.
analyzed: sadāti

original: Tattha jarā ca maraṇañca imāni dve saṅkhatassa saṅkhatalakkhaṇāni.
analyzed: tattha jarā ca maraṇañca imāni dve saṅkhatassa saṅkhata lakkhaṇāni

original: Jarāyaṁ ṭhitassa aññathattaṁ, maraṇaṁ vayo.
analyzed: jarāyam ṭhitassa aññathatta maraṇam vayaḥ

original: Tattha jarāya ca maraṇassa ca atthato nānattaṁ.
analyzed: tattha jarāya ca maraṇassa ca atthataḥ nānatta

original: Kena kāraṇena, gabbhagatāpi hi mīyanti, na ca te jiṇṇā bhavanti.
analyzed: kena kāraṇena gabbha gatāḥ api hi mīyanti na ca te jiṇṇāḥ bhavanti

original: Atthi ca devānaṁ maraṇaṁ, na ca tesaṁ sarīrāni jīranti.
analyzed: atthi ca devānam na ca tesam sarīrāni jīranti

original: Sakkateva jarāya paṭikammaṁ kātuṁ, na pana sakkate maraṇassa paṭikammaṁ kātuṁ aññatreva iddhimantānaṁ iddhivisayā.
analyzed: sakkatā iva jarāya paṭikammam kātu na pana sakkate maraṇassa paṭikammam kātum aññatra iva iddhimantānam iddhi visayā

original: Yaṁ panāha taṇhāsallena otiṇṇoti dissanti vītarāgā jīrantāpi mīyantāpi.
analyzed: yam pana āha taṇhā sallena dissanti vīta rāgāḥ jīranta api mīyanta api

original: Yadi ca yathā jarāmaraṇaṁ, evaṁ taṇhāpi siyā.
analyzed: yadi ca yathā jarā maraṇe evam taṇhā api siyā

original: Evaṁ sante sabbe yobbanaṭṭhāpi vigatataṇhā siyuṁ.
analyzed: evam sante sabbe yobbana ṭṭhā api vigata taṇhāḥ siyu

original: Yathā ca taṇhā dukkhassa samudayo, evaṁ jarāmaraṇampi siyā dukkhassa samudayo, na ca siyā taṇhā dukkhassa samudayo, na hi jarāmaraṇaṁ dukkhassa samudayo, taṇhā dukkhassa samudayo.
analyzed: yathā ca taṇhā dukkhassa samudayaḥ evam jarā maraṇam pi siyā dukkhassa samudayaḥ na ca siyā taṇhā dukkhassa samudayaḥ na hi jarā maraṇam dukkhassa samudayaḥ taṇhā dukkhassa samudayaḥ

original: Yathā ca taṇhā maggavajjhā, evaṁ jarāmaraṇampi siyā maggavajjhaṁ.
analyzed: yathā ca taṇhā magga vajjhā evam jarā maraṇam pi siyā magga vajjha

original: Imāya yuttiyā aññamaññehi kāraṇehi gavesitabbaṁ.
analyzed: imāya yuttiyā aññamaññehi kāraṇehi

original: Yadi ca sandissati yuttisamārūḷhaṁ atthato ca aññattaṁ, byañjanatopi gavesitabbaṁ.
analyzed: yadi ca sandissati yutti samārūḍham atthataḥ ca byañjanataḥ pi

original: Salloti vā dhūpāyananti vā imesaṁ dhammānaṁ atthato ekattaṁ.
analyzed: vā dhūpāyananti vā imesam dhammānam atthataḥ ekatta

original: Na hi yujjati icchāya ca taṇhāya ca atthato aññattaṁ.
analyzed: na hi yujjati icchāya ca taṇhāya ca atthataḥ

original: Taṇhāya adhippāye aparipūramāne navasu āghātavatthūsu kodho ca upanāho ca uppajjati.
analyzed: taṇhāya adhippāye a paripūramāne navasu āghāta vatthūsu kodhaḥ ca upanāhaḥ ca uppajjati

original: Imāya yuttiyā jarāya ca maraṇassa ca taṇhāya ca atthato aññattaṁ.
analyzed: imāya yuttiyā jarāya ca maraṇassa ca taṇhāya ca atthataḥ aññatta

original: Yaṁ panidaṁ bhagavatā dvīhi nāmehi abhilapitaṁ icchātipi taṇhātipi, idaṁ bhagavatā
analyzed: yam panidam bhagavatā dvīhi nāmehi abhilapitam icchātipi taṇhātipi idam bhagavatā

original: bāhirānaṁ vatthūnaṁ ārammaṇavasena dvīhi nāmehi abhilapitaṁ icchātipi taṇhātipi,
analyzed: bāhirānam vatthūnam ārammaṇa vasena dvīhi nāmehi abhilapitam icchā atipi taṇhā atipi

original: sabbā hi taṇhā ajjhosānalakkhaṇena ekalakkhaṇā.
analyzed: sabbā hi taṇhā ajjhosāna lakkhaṇena eka lakkhaṇā

original: Yathā sabbo aggi uṇhattalakkhaṇena ekalakkhaṇo, api ca upādānavasena aññamaññāni
analyzed: yathā sabbaḥ aggi uṇhatta lakkhaṇena eka lakkhaṇaḥ api ca upādāna vasena aññamaññāni

original: nāmāni labhati, kaṭṭhaggītipi tiṇaggītipi sakalikaggītipi gomayaggītipi thusaggītipi
analyzed: nāmāni labhati kaṭṭhaggītipi tiṇaggītipi sakalikaggītipi gomayaggītipi thusaggītipi

original: saṅkāraggītipi, sabbo hi aggi uṇhattalakkhaṇova.
analyzed: saṅkāra ggi iti pi sabbaḥ hi aggi uṇhatta lakkhaṇaḥ uva

original: Evaṁ sabbā taṇhā ajjhosānalakkhaṇena ekalakkhaṇā, api tu ārammaṇaupādānavasena aññamaññehi
analyzed: evam sabbā taṇhā ajjhosāna lakkhaṇena eka lakkhaṇā api tu ārammaṇa aupādāna vasena aññamaññehi

original: nāmehi abhilapitā icchāitipi taṇhāitipi salloitipi dhūpāyanāitipi saritāitipi visattikāitipi
analyzed: nāmehi abhilapitā icchā itipi taṇhā itipi sallo itipi dhūpāyanā itipi saritā itipi visattikā itipi

original: sinehoitipi kilamathoitipi latāitipi maññanāitipi bandhoitipi āsāitipi pipāsāitipi
analyzed: sineho itipi kilamatho itipi latā itipi maññanā itipi bandho itipi āsā itipi pipāsā itipi

original: abhinandanāitipi, iti sabbā taṇhā ajjhosānalakkhaṇena ekalakkhaṇā.
analyzed: iti sabbā taṇhā ajjhosāna lakkhaṇena eka lakkhaṇā

original: Yathā ca vevacane vuttā.
analyzed: yathā ca vevacane vuttā

original: “Āsā ca pihā abhinandanā ca,
analyzed: āsā ca pihā abhinandanā ca

original: Anekadhātūsu sarā patiṭṭhitā;
analyzed: aneka dhātūsu sarā patiṭṭhitā

original: Aññāṇamūlappabhavā pajappitā,
analyzed: aññāṇa mūla ppabhavā pajappitā

original: Sabbā mayā byantikatā samūlikā”ti.
analyzed: sabbā mayā byantika tā sa mūlikā ati

original: Taṇhāyetaṁ vevacanaṁ.
analyzed: vevacana

original: Yathāha bhagavā—
analyzed: yathā āha bhagavān

original: rūpe, tissa, avigatarāgassa avigatacchandassa avigatapemassa avigatapipāsassa avigatapariḷāhassa.
analyzed: rūpe tissa avigata rāgassa avigata chandassa avigata pemassa avigata pipāsassa avigata pariḷāhassa

original: Evaṁ vedanāya saññāya saṅkhāresu viññāṇe avigatarāgassa avigatacchandassa avigatapemassa avigatapipāsassa avigatapariḷāhassa sabbaṁ suttaṁ vitthāretabbaṁ.
analyzed: evam vedanāya saññāya saṅkhāresu viññāṇe avigata rāgassa avigata chandassa avigata pemassa avigata pipāsassa avigata pariḷāhassa sabbam suttam vitthāretabba

original: Taṇhāyetaṁ vevacanaṁ, evaṁ yujjati.
analyzed: vevacane evam yujjati

original: Sabbo dukkhūpacāro kāmataṇhāsaṅkhāramūlako, na pana yujjati sabbo nibbidūpacāro kāmataṇhāparikkhāramūlako.
analyzed: sabbaḥ dukkha upacāraḥ kāma taṇhā saṅkhāra mūlakaḥ na pana yujjati sabbaḥ nibbida upacāraḥ kāma taṇhā parikkhāra mūlakaḥ

original: Imāya yuttiyā aññamaññehi kāraṇehi gavesitabbaṁ.
analyzed: imāya yuttiyā aññamaññehi kāraṇehi

original: Yathā hi bhagavā rāgacaritassa puggalassa asubhaṁ desayati, dosacaritassa bhagavā puggalassa mettaṁ desayati.
analyzed: yathā hi bhagavā rāga caritassa puggalassa asubham desayati dosa caritassa bhagavā puggalassa mettam desayati

original: Mohacaritassa bhagavā puggalassa paṭiccasamuppādaṁ desayati.
analyzed: moha caritassa bhagavā puggalassa paṭiccasamuppādam desayati

original: Yadi hi bhagavā rāgacaritassa puggalassa mettaṁ cetovimuttiṁ deseyya.
analyzed: yadi hi bhagavā rāga caritassa puggalassa mettam cetaḥ vimuttim deseyya

original: Sukhaṁ vā paṭipadaṁ dandhābhiññaṁ sukhaṁ vā paṭipadaṁ khippābhiññaṁ vipassanāpubbaṅgamaṁ vā pahānaṁ deseyya, na yujjati desanā.
analyzed: sukham vā paṭipadam dandha abhiññam sukham vā paṭipadam khippa abhiññam vipassanā pubbaṅgamam vā pahānam deseyya na yujjati desanā

original: Evaṁ yaṁ kiñci rāgassa anulomappahānaṁ dosassa anulomappahānaṁ mohassa anulomappahānaṁ.
analyzed: evam yam kiñci rāgassa anuloma pahānam dosassa anuloma ppahānam mohassa anuloma ppahāna

original: Sabbaṁ taṁ vicayena hārena vicinitvā yuttihārena yojetabbaṁ.
analyzed: sabbam tam vicayena hārena vicinitvā yutti hārena yojetabba

original: Yāvatikā ñāṇassa bhūmi.
analyzed: yāvatikā ñāṇassa bhūmi

original: Mettāvihārissa sato byāpādo cittaṁ pariyādāya ṭhassatīti na yujjati desanā, byāpādo pahānaṁ abbhatthaṁ gacchatīti yujjati desanā.
analyzed: mettāvihārissa sataḥ byāpādo cittam pariyādāya ṭhassati iti na yujjati desanā byāpādo pahānam abbhattham gacchati iti yujjati desanā

original: Karuṇāvihārissa sato vihesā cittaṁ pariyādāya ṭhassatīti na yujjati desanā, vihesā pahānaṁ abbhatthaṁ gacchatīti yujjati desanā.
analyzed: karuṇā vihārissa sataḥ vihesā cittam pariyādāya ṭhassati iti na yujjati desanā vihesā pahānam abbhattham gacchati iti yujjati desanā

original: Muditāvihārissa sato arati cittaṁ pariyādāya ṭhassatīti na yujjati desanā, arati pahānaṁ abbhatthaṁ gacchatīti yujjati desanā.
analyzed: muditāvihārissa sataḥ arati cittam pariyādāya ṭhassati iti na yujjati desanā arati pahānam abbhattham gacchati iti yujjati desanā

original: Upekkhāvihārissa sato rāgo cittaṁ pariyādāya ṭhassatīti na yujjati desanā, rāgo pahānaṁ abbhatthaṁ gacchatīti yujjati desanā.
analyzed: upekkhā vihārissa sataḥ rāgaḥ cittam pariyādāya na yujjati desanā rāgaḥ pahānam abbhattham gacchati iti yujjati desanā

original: Animittavihārissa sato nimittānusārī tena teneva viññāṇaṁ pavattatīti na yujjati desanā, nimittaṁ pahānaṁ abbhatthaṁ gacchatīti yujjati desanā.
analyzed: animitta vihārissa sataḥ nimitta anusārī tena tena iva viññāṇam pavattati iti na yujjati desanā nimittam pahānam abbhattham gacchati iti yujjati desanā

original: Asmīti vigataṁ ayamahamasmīti na samanupassāmi.
analyzed: asmi iti vigatam ayam aham asmi iti na samanupassāmi

original: Atha ca pana me kismīti kathasmīti vicikicchā kathaṅkathāsallaṁ cittaṁ pariyādāya
analyzed: atha ca pana me kismi iti kathasmi iti vicikicchā kathaṅkathā sallam cittam pariyādāya

original: ṭhassatīti na yujjati desanā, vicikicchā kathaṅkathāsallaṁ pahānaṁ abbhatthaṁ gacchatīti yujjati desanā.
analyzed: ṭhassati iti na yujjati desanā vicikicchā kathaṅkathā sallam pahānam abbhattham gacchati iti yujjati desanā

original: Yathā vā pana paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ samāpannassa sato kāmarāgabyāpādā visesāya saṁvattantīti na yujjati desanā, hānāya saṁvattantīti yujjati desanā.
analyzed: yathā vā pana paṭhamam jhānam samāpannassa sataḥ kāma rāga byāpādāḥ visesāya savattanti iti na yujjati desanā hānāya savattanti iti yujjati desanā

original: Vitakkasahagatā vā saññāmanasikārā hānāya saṁvattantīti na yujjati desanā, visesāya saṁvattantīti yujjati desanā.
analyzed: vitakka sahagatāḥ vā saññā manasikārāḥ hānāya savattanti iti na yujjati desanā visesāya savattanti iti yujjati desanā

original: Dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ samāpannassa sato vitakkavicārasahagatā saññāmanasikārā visesāya saṁvattantīti na yujjati desanā, hānāya saṁvattantīti yujjati desanā.
analyzed: dutiyam jhānam samāpannassa sataḥ vitakka vicāra sahagatā saññā manasikārāḥ visesāya savattanti iti na yujjati desanā hānāya savattanti iti yujjati desanā

original: Upekkhāsukhasahagatā vā saññāmanasikārā hānāya saṁvattantīti na yujjati desanā, visesāya saṁvattantīti yujjati desanā.
analyzed: upekkhā sukha sahagatāḥ vā saññā manasikārāḥ hānāya savattanti iti na yujjati desanā visesāya savattanti iti yujjati desanā

original: Tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ samāpannassa sato pītisukhasahagatā saññāmanasikārā visesāya saṁvattantīti
analyzed: tatiyam jhānam samāpannassa sataḥ pīti sukha sahagatā saññā manasikārāḥ visesāya savattanti iti

original: na yujjati desanā, hānāya saṁvattantīti yujjati desanā, upekkhāsatipārisuddhisahagatā
analyzed: na yujjati desanā hānāya savattanti iti yujjati desanā upekkhā sati pārisuddhi sahagatā

original: vā saññāmanasikārā hānāya saṁvattantīti na yujjati desanā, visesāya saṁvattantīti yujjati desanā.
analyzed: vā saññā manasikārāḥ hānāya savattanti iti na yujjati desanā visesāya savattanti iti yujjati desanā

original: Catutthaṁ jhānaṁ samāpannassa sato upekkhāsahagatā saññāmanasikārā visesāya saṁvattantīti na yujjati desanā, hānāya saṁvattantīti yujjati desanā.
analyzed: catuttham jhānam samāpannassa sataḥ upekkhā sahagatā saññā manasikārā visesāya savattanti iti na yujjati desanā hānāya savattanti iti yujjati desanā

original: Ākāsānañcāyatanasahagatā vā saññāmanasikārā hānāya saṁvattantīti na yujjati desanā, visesāya saṁvattantīti yujjati desanā.
analyzed: ākāsa anañcāyatana sahagatāḥ vā saññā manasikārāḥ hānāya savattanti iti na yujjati desanā visesāya savattanti iti yujjati desanā

original: Ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ samāpannassa sato rūpasahagatā saññāmanasikārā visesāya saṁvattantīti na yujjati desanā, hānāya saṁvattantīti yujjati desanā.
analyzed: ākāsānañcāyatanam samāpannassa sato rūpa sahagatā saññā manasikārāḥ visesāya savattanti iti na yujjati desanā hānāya savattanti iti yujjati desanā

original: Viññāṇañcāyatanasahagatā vā saññāmanasikārā hānāya saṁvattantīti na yujjati desanā, visesāya saṁvattantīti yujjati desanā.
analyzed: viññāṇañcāyatana sahagatāḥ vā saññā manasikārāḥ hānāya savattanti iti na yujjati desanā visesāya savattanti iti yujjati desanā

original: Viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ samāpannassa sato ākāsānañcāyatanasahagatā saññāmanasikārā visesāya saṁvattantīti na yujjati desanā, hānāya saṁvattantīti yujjati desanā.
analyzed: viññāṇañcāyatanam samāpannassa sataḥ ākāsānañcāyatana sahagatā saññā manasikārāḥ visesāya savattanti iti na yujjati desanā hānāya savattanti iti yujjati desanā

original: Ākiñcaññāyatanasahagatā vā saññāmanasikārā hānāya saṁvattantīti na yujjati desanā, visesāya saṁvattantīti yujjati desanā.
analyzed: ākiñcaññāyatana sahagatāḥ vā saññā manasikārāḥ hānāya savattanti iti na yujjati desanā visesāya savattanti iti yujjati desanā

original: Ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ samāpannassa sato viññāṇañcāyatanasahagatā saññāmanasikārā visesāya saṁvattantīti na yujjati desanā, hānāya saṁvattantīti yujjati desanā.
analyzed: ākiñcaññāyatanam samāpannassa sataḥ viññāṇañcāyatana sahagatā saññā manasikārāḥ visesāya savattanti iti na yujjati desanā hānāya savattanti iti yujjati desanā

original: Nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasahagatā vā saññāmanasikārā hānāya saṁvattantīti na yujjati desanā, visesāya saṁvattantīti yujjati desanā.
analyzed: nevasaññā nāsañña āyatana sahagatāḥ vā saññā manasikārāḥ hānāya savattanti iti na yujjati desanā visesāya savattanti iti yujjati desanā

original: Nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ samāpannassa sato saññūpacārā visesāya saṁvattantīti na yujjati desanā, hānāya saṁvattantīti yujjati desanā.
analyzed: nevasaññānāsaññāyatanam samāpannassa sato saññu upacārāḥ visesāya savattanti iti na yujjati desanā hānāya savattanti iti yujjati desanā

original: Saññāvedayitanirodhasahagatā vā saññāmanasikārā hānāya saṁvattantīti na yujjati desanā, visesāya saṁvattantīti yujjati desanā.
analyzed: saññā vedayita nirodha sahagatāḥ vā saññā manasikārāḥ hānāya savattanti iti na yujjati desanā visesāya savattanti iti yujjati desanā

original: Kallatāparicitaṁ cittaṁ na ca abhinīhāraṁ khamatīti na yujjati desanā, kallatāparicitaṁ cittaṁ atha ca abhinīhāraṁ khamatīti yujjati desanā.
analyzed: kalla tā paricitam cittam na ca abhinīhāram khamati iti na yujjati desanā kalla tā paricitam cittam atha ca abhinīhāram khamati iti yujjati desanā

original: Evaṁ sabbe navasuttantā yathādhammaṁ yathāvinayaṁ yathāsatthusāsanaṁ sabbato vicayena hārena vicinitvā yuttihārena yojetabbāti.
analyzed: evam sabbe nava suttantāḥ yathādhammam yathāvinayam yathā satthu sāsanam sabbatas vicayena hārena vicinitvā yutti hārena yojetabbā ati

original: Tenāha āyasmā mahākaccāyano “sabbesaṁ hārānaṁ yā bhūmi yo ca gocaro tesan”ti.
analyzed: tena āha āyasmā mahākaccāyanaḥ sabbesam yā bhūmi yā ca gocaro

original: Niyutto yutti hāro.
analyzed: niyuttaḥ yutti hāraḥ
